title: Where will Kaepernick, Goff end up?
itunes:title: Where will Kaepernick, Goff end up?
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling, and Gregg Rosenthal – discuss all the latest news from around the NFL, including reports that Peyton Manning is set to announce his retirement soon, and quarterback Colin Kaepernick’s agents requesting a trade from the 49ers. Then, the heroes check in with NFL.com draft analyst Lance Zierlein for a full breakdown of the hottest prospects from the 2016 Scouting Combine.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
